今人: (こんじん) - present-day people; people of this world
今以て: (いまもって) - until now; still; yet; (not) yet; since
今冬: (こんとう) - this winter; next winter; last winter
今出来: (いまでき) - something new (with nuance of poor quality); out now; fresh
今国会: (こんこっかい) - current Diet session
今夏: (こんか) - this summer; next summer; last summer
今宮: (いまみや) - newly born imperial prince; newly constructed (branch) shrine
今川焼: (いまがわやき) - Japanese muffin containing bean jam, served hot
今川焼き: (いまがわやき) - Japanese muffin containing bean jam, served hot
今年中に: (ことしちゅうに) - by the end of this year; before the year comes to a close; during this year
今年度: (こんねんど) - this year; this fiscal year; this school year
今度: (kondo) - desta vez, agora; da próxima vez, outra vez, em breve, logo, desta vez, agora; da próxima vez, outra vez, em breve, logo; recentemente, anterior, último
今度限り: (こんどかぎり) - for this once only
今思うと: (いまおもうと) - thinking back now
今戸焼: (いまどやき) - Imado (part of Edo) unglazed porcelain; Imado ware
今日: (kyou) - hoje, neste dia; ultimamente, recentemente, nos dias de hoje
今日このごろ: (きょうこのごろ) - these days; nowadays; recently
今日この頃: (きょうこのごろ) - these days; nowadays; recently
今日た: (こんにった) - today/this day/used in theater (kyogen, noh song, kabuki) when emphasizing; these days/recently/nowadays
今日では: (こんにちでは) - nowadays; in this day and age
今日という今日: (きょうというきょう) - this very day; today is the day (that ...); today for sure
今日は: (こんちは) - (こんちは is col.) hello; good day (daytime greeting)
今日は人の身明日は我が身: (きょうはひとのみあすはわがみ) - What chances to one man may happen to all
今日中に: (きょうじゅうに) - by today; before the day is over
今日明日: (きょうあす) - (yoji) today and tomorrow; today or tomorrow; in a day or two
今日昨日: (きょうきのう) - (yoji) today and yesterday; (something that happened) only yesterday (just recently)
今日此の頃: (きょうこのごろ) - these days; nowadays; recently
今日此頃: (きょうこのごろ) - these days; nowadays; recently
今明日: (こんみょうにち) - today and (or) tomorrow
今昔物語: (こんじゃくものがたり) - Konjaku Monogatarishuu (31-volume collection of stories written during the late Heian period)
今昔物語集: (こんじゃくものがたりしゅう) - Konjaku Monogatarishuu (31-volume collection of stories written during the late Heian period)
今春: (こんしゅん) - this spring; spring this year
今是昨非: (こんぜさくひ) - (yoji) complete reversal of values or ways of thinking (over time); What appeared wrong in the past now appears right; realizing and regretting the past errors of one's ways
今時: (いまどき) - present day; today; recently; these days; nowadays; at this hour
今更: (いまさら) - now (after such a long time)/at this late hour (i.e. it is too late for something); afresh/anew/again
今更ながら: (いまさらながら) - although at this late hour/now, although it is too late; afresh/anew/again
今更感: (いまさらかん) - feeling that something has come too late
今月中に: (こんげつじゅうに) - by the end of this month; before the month is out; in the course of this month
今月分: (こんげつぶん) - (charge) for this month
今月末: (こんげつまつ) - end of this month
今様歌: (いまよううた) - Heian poetry style
今次: (こんじ) - the present time; new; recent
今泣いた烏がもう笑う: (いまないたからすがもうわらう) - someone who was just crying quickly cheers up and smiles; a child's emotions change easily
今現在: (いまげんざい) - just now; at this moment; at this point of time
今生: (こんじょう) - this life; this world
今生の別れ: (こんじょうのわかれ) - final farewell
今直ぐ: (いますぐ) - at once; immediately; right now
今程: (いまほど) - recently; a moment before
今般: (こんぱん) - now; recently; this time
今茲: (こんじ) - this year; the current year
今迄: (いままで) - until now; so far; up to the present
今週中に: (こんしゅうじゅうに) - before the week is out; before the week is over; within the week; sometime this week
今際: (いまわ) - one's dying moment or hour
今際の際: (いまわのきわ) - verge of death; dying moments
介して: (かいして) - through the medium of
介す: (かいす) - to use as an intermediary/to mediate/to assist; to worry/to mind/to care
介する: (かいする) - to use as an intermediary/to mediate/to assist; to worry/to mind/to care
介党鱈: (スケトウダラ) - walleye pollack; Alaska pollack (Theragra chalcogramma)
介助: (かいじょ) - help/assistance/aid; to assist/to help/to aid
